title: saDeya samsAra
sahitya:
saDeya samsAra sAgaravendu tiLiyade drDha buddhiyinda nararyAke keDutiharayya


caraNam 1    honnu haNavuLLavara banni kuLLirendu mannisuvaradhika sambhramadindali 
unnat-aishvaryavillada baDava tA baralu kunni hOgenuta aTTuvar mUDhatanadi
    caraNam 2    baDavanAdare Atma baDavaneE mattOrva kaDu bhAgyanAgi ballidanAdane 
biDade maNNiLoLLidda cinnavadu keDuvude baDava ballidenemba nuDi AtmaguNTe
    caraNam 3    initella mAya mOhakavemba sharadhiyoLu anudinavu muLugi kODalekoLisuta 
cinumayAmbudhi purandara viTTala nenedu ghana padavanaiduvaru bhajisirayya
